testName: Verify Successful Login with Valid Credentials

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Verify that the 'Customer Login' section is displayed
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the URL contains '/overview.htm'
Verify that the welcome message with the customer name is displayed
Verify that the 'Accounts Overview' heading is displayed
Verify that the list of available accounts with account numbers and balances is displayed
Verify that the right-side navigation menu with banking options is displayed
Verify that the 'Log Out' link is visible in the top navigation

testName: Verify Login Failure with Invalid Credentials

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the invalid username 'invaliduser'
Enter the invalid password 'invalidpass'
Click the Log In button
Verify that the login fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Verify Access Denied to Protected Pages without Login

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Attempt to navigate to the protected account overview page
Verify that access is denied and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Verify Successful Account Opening with Valid Source Account

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Navigate to the 'Open Account' page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Enter the valid source account number '29217'
Click the 'Open New Account' button
Verify that a new account is successfully opened and displayed on the account overview page

testName: Verify Failed Account Opening with Invalid Source Account

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Navigate to the 'Open Account' page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Enter the invalid source account number '12345'
Click the 'Open New Account' button
Verify that the account opening fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Verify Login Failure with Empty Credentials

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Leave the username field empty
Leave the password field empty
Click the Log In button
Verify that the login fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)
